githapi 0.10.4
  • Reference
  • Release Notes

Reference

Repositories, Commits and Files

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting repositories, commits and files.

create_repository()

Create a repository for a user or organization

update_repository()

Update a user or organization repository

view_repositories() view_repository() browse_repository()

View repositories for a user, team or organization

delete_repository()

Delete a user or organization repository

upload_commit()

Upload a directory of files and create a commit

download_commit()

Download a commit from GitHub

view_commits() view_commit() browse_commits() browse_commit()

View commits within a repository

compare_commits()

View commits made between two commits

view_sha()

View the SHA for a commit

upload_files()

Upload files and create a commit

download_file()

Download a file from GitHub

create_file()

Create a file in a new commit

update_file()

Update a file in a new commit

view_files() view_file() browse_files() browse_file()

View files within a repository

compare_files()

View file changes made between two commits

delete_file()

Delete a file in a new commit

write_github_file() write_github_lines() write_github_csv()

Write a file to a branch

read_github_file() read_github_lines() read_github_csv()

Read files from a commit

github_source()

Source a R script from a commit

Branches, Tags and Releases

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting branches, tags and releases.

create_branch()

Create a branch in a repository

update_branch()

Update a branch in a repository

view_branches() view_branch()

View branches within a repository

delete_branch()

Delete a branch from a repository

create_tag()

Create a tag in a repository

update_tag()

Update a tag in a repository

view_tags() view_tag()

View tags within a repository

delete_tag()

Delete a tag from a repository

create_release()

Create a release in a repository

update_release()

Update a release in a repository

view_releases() view_release() browse_release()

View releases within a repository

delete_release()

Delete a release from a repository

Issues, Pull Requests, Labels and Milestones

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting issues and pull requests.

create_issue()

Create an issue in a repository

update_issue()

Update an issue in a repository

view_issues() view_issue() browse_issue()

View issues within a repository or organization

create_pull_request()

Create an pull request in a repository

update_pull_request()

Update a pull request in a repository

view_pull_requests() view_pull_request() browse_pull_request()

View pull requests within a repository

create_label()

Create an issue label in a repository

update_label()

Update a label in a repository

add_labels() remove_labels()

Add or remove labels from an issue or pull request

view_labels() view_label()

View labels within a repository

delete_label()

Delete a label from a repository

create_milestone()

Create a milestone in a repository

update_milestone()

Update a milestone in a repository

view_milestones() view_milestone() browse_milestone()

View milestones within a repository

delete_milestone()

Delete a milestone from a repository

Gists and Comments

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting gists and comments.

create_gist()

Create a gist in github

update_gist()

Update a gist in GitHub

view_gists() view_gist() browse_gist()

View gists in GitHub

delete_gist()

Delete a gist in GitHub

download_gist()

Download a gist from GitHub

source_gist()

Source a gist from GitHub

create_comment()

Create a comment in github

update_comment()

Update a comment in a repository

view_comments() view_comment() browse_comment()

View comments in GitHub

delete_comment()

Delete a comment from GitHub

Projects, Columns and Cards

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting projects, columns and cards.

create_project()

Create a GitHub project

update_project()

Update a GitHub project

view_projects() view_project() browse_project()

View GitHub projects

delete_project()

Delete a GitHub project

create_column()

Create a column in a GitHub project

update_column() move_column()

Update a column in a GitHub project

view_columns() view_column()

View columns within a GitHub project

delete_column()

Delete a column in a GitHub project

create_card()

Create a card in a GitHub project

update_card() move_card()

Update a card in a GitHub project

view_cards() view_card()

View cards within a GitHub project

delete_card()

Delete a card in a GitHub project

Users, Organizations and Teams

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting users, organizations and teams.

update_user()

Update your user properties in GitHub

view_users() view_user() browse_user()

View users in GitHub

update_organization()

Update an organization's properties in GitHub

view_organizations() view_organization() browse_organization()

View organizations in GitHub

create_team()

Create a team in a GitHub organization

update_team()

Update a team's properties in GitHub

view_teams() view_team() browse_team()

View teams in an organization in GitHub

delete_team()

Delete a team in GitHub

update_membership()

Update membership of an organization or team

view_memberships() view_membership()

View membership of organizations or teams

delete_membership()

Remove a member from an organization or team.

update_collaborator()

Update collaborators for a repository or project

view_collaborators() view_collaborator()

View collaborators in an organization, repository or project

delete_collaborator()

Remove a collaborator from a repository, project or organization.

Utilities

Useful functions.

is_sha()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid SHA

is_ref()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid reference name

is_repo()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid repository name

GitHub API

Functions for accessing the GitHub API.

gh_token()

Get a token for accessing GitHub

gh_url()

Build the URL for the GitHub API

gh_request()

Send an HTTP request to the GitHub API

gh_page()

Get multiple pages from the GitHub API

gh_find()

Find an entity by matching a property value

gh_download()

Download a file from GitHub
